name: logtower-monorepo
description: Portable threat hunting and forensic triage suite

scripts.build: tsc -p packages/core && tsc -p packages/engine && tsc -p packages/rules && tsc -p packages/eval && tsc -p packages/cli && node packages/cli/scripts/copy-bin.mjs
scripts.build:all: npm run build:rust && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:rust || echo 'Rust build skipped (cargo not found)'
